CCSS.MATH.CONTENT.HSA-CED.A.1.cluster: Create equations that describe numbers or relationships
CCSS.MATH.CONTENT.HSA-CED.A.1.standard: Create equations and inequalities in one variable and use them to solve problems. Include equations arising from linear and quadratic functions, and simple rational and exponential functions.
CCSS.MATH.CONTENT.HSA-CED.A.1.subject: Algebra
learning_objectives: Understand how to represent real-world problems as mathematical equations
Create equations in one variable to model situations
Distinguish between different types of functions in equations
example_problems: A cell phone plan costs $50 per month plus $0.10 per text message. Write an equation to represent the monthly cost.
The population of a town increases by 2% each year. Write an equation to model the population after t years.

CCSS.MATH.CONTENT.HSA-CED.A.2.cluster: Create equations that describe numbers or relationships
CCSS.MATH.CONTENT.HSA-CED.A.2.standard: Create equations in two or more variables to represent relationships between quantities; graph equations on coordinate axes with labels and scales.
CCSS.MATH.CONTENT.HSA-CED.A.2.subject: Algebra

CCSS.MATH.CONTENT.HSG-CO.A.1.cluster: Experiment with transformations in the plane
CCSS.MATH.CONTENT.HSG-CO.A.1.standard: Know precise definitions of angle, circle, perpendicular line, parallel line, and line segment, based on the undefined notions of point, line, distance along a line, and distance around a circular arc.
CCSS.MATH.CONTENT.HSG-CO.A.1.subject: Geometry
